page.title: 06WINCHESTER LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The{police}H.Q.,built 1847,rebuilt 1966,was opened by Princess Margaret. The headquarters store records on criminals.Our{"local bobbies"}maintain radio contact with H.Q. Vandalism is the most common problem.The yearly crime figures for the area are: 432 crimes,200 thefts,105 robberies. Next door to the H.Q.is the Winchester {Prison}which has 360 cells for criminals,277 of them for 2 people,14 of them for 4 people and one for 6 people,but the ones that are usually full are the 68 cells for 1 person.The actual building covers 5 acres.The prison has 330 staff, 65 of them are non-uniformed officers, 186 are disipline officers and are uniformed. Most criminals serve a sentence of five years to life. Down the Romsey Road are the{Law Courts.}Our parents sometimes perform jury service there.
